jobTitle: Sales Account Executive - Western Region - Remote | WFH
description:
Do you crave a challenge and the chance to revolutionize how businesses operate?

We're looking for a rockstar Account Executive to join our passionate team and champion a groundbreaking AI-powered enterprise solution. You'll be instrumental in helping companies achieve a truly digitalized future, streamlining planning across all facets of their operations.

Here's a Taste Of What Awaits You

Be a Hero: Help companies become market leaders by introducing them to a game-changing solution that unifies strategic, financial, and supply chain planning.

Shape the Future: Sell a cutting-edge platform that empowers businesses to adapt autonomously and capitalize on growth.

Become an Expert: Dive deep into a cutting-edge AI solution and leverage your knowledge to build trust with high-level executives.

Make an Impact: Drive revenue by identifying new opportunities and developing strategic relationships with key decision-makers.

Thrive in a Dynamic Environment: Enjoy the flexibility of a remote role while collaborating with a talented team.

Do you have the chops to take it on?

You're a proven closer with a track record of exceeding sales goals (think big numbers!).

You have a knack for building rapport with senior executives and getting them on board with innovative solutions.

You're a master communicator with the ability to craft compelling presentations and negotiate like a pro.

You're a self-motivated go-getter with the ability to work independently and think on your feet.

You possess a minimum of 5 years of experience selling complex software solutions within the enterprise space.

Bonus Points If You Have

Experience selling cloud-based solutions and within manufacturing-oriented industries.

A passion for supply chain optimization and the desire to make a real difference.

The Rewards

Competitive salary and commission structure

Stock options to share in the company's success

Comprehensive benefits package

Ready to join the revolution?

Let's chat! Submit your resume and tell us why you're the perfect fit.

Employment Type: Full-Time
